title: Your favorite champion suddenly says something completely out of character.
body:
Here's an example:

{{champion:89}} the champion of the sun, an image of justice and purity everywhere. The only things you would expect her to say are kind things and words of encouragement. But then she suddenly says "I WILL DRAVEN YOU!"

replies.body: {{champion:64}} : "The scenery is beautiful!"

"Hi"

{{champion:33}}

{{champion:115}} "We'll need to take some safety precautions."

{{champion:27}} "That seems unethical."

{{champion:96}} "I'm full."

{{champion:79}} "I'm Gragas, and I'm an alcoholic."

{{champion:22}} "Weaklings! Crush them. They deserve no pity."

{{champion:25}} "Don't worry. You're safe with me."
